Name: BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA! üêª
About the game: BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA! - is a realistic shooting game in a historic period of World War II of great Soviet Union. You play as generic russian solider trying to defend your Great Motherland with the widely famous AK-47. Your main goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and defend the Motherland from nazi occupation. Press 'V' to drink vodka and heal. Press 'b' to play balalaika. Features: Truly russian spirit and atmosphere Shoot legendary russian weapon - AK-47 Drink honest russian Vodka Play on balalaika Trading Cards are now available!
